translation.en: If you're watching this, then I'm not around anymore.
translation.zh: 你如果在看本片 就意味着我已经不在了

translation.en: I couldn't say any of this to your face. It's too embarrassing.
translation.zh: 我没法当着你的面说这些 太丢人了

translation.en: For you, not for me, obviously.
translation.zh: 对你来说丢人 不是对我来说

translation.en: You're never very good at hearing how lovely you are.
translation.zh: 你从不擅长听我夸你有多么的好
但你可真够他妈的没用

translation.en: So I thought I'd leave you a little guide to life without me.
translation.zh: 所以我想给你留下一个 没了我的生活的小指南

translation.en: You've gotta turn the alarm off in the morning, yeah?
translation.zh: 早上得把警报器给关掉 知道吗？

translation.en: If you open the door, it'll set it off,
translation.zh: 因为你一开门就会触响警报器

translation.en: then the alarm company think we're getting broken into.
translation.zh: 那警报器公司就会以为我们家进贼了

translation.en: If you do set it off, you've gotta ring 'em.
translation.zh: 如果警报器响了 你得给他们打电话

translation.en: The number's in your phone under "alarm." The alarm code is 8645.
translation.zh: 号码就在你电话里 备注“警报器” 警报器密码是八 六 四 五

translation.en: And... put it on "perimeter," otherwise the dog will set it off.
translation.zh: 记得将它设置为周界防区 要不然狗会触响它
还有记得喂狗 知道不？

translation.en: First thing in the morning and when you get in from work.
translation.zh: 早上一次 下班后一次

translation.en: Gotta put the bins out Tuesday evenings.
translation.zh: 星期二晚上记得把垃圾桶放外面去

translation.en: ♪ When I wake up in the morning, love ♪
♪ And I know it's gonna be ♪

translation.zh: （乔丹斯古董中心营业中 内有有趣物品）

translation.en: -I'll get you some real food later. -[whines]
translation.zh: 我等下去给你搞点像样的食物
那我只能吃蔬菜咖喱了
我今天开始在这里上班

translation.en: Okay. Do you have a name?
No, I mean, who are you meant to meet here?
translation.zh: 不 我的意思是 你是来见谁的？

translation.en: Your dog should be on a lead.
Can't you read? The park's for everyone.
translation.zh: 不识字吗？这是大家的公园
噢 对 真不好意思

translation.en: What?! He is not a fat, hairy, nosy cocksucker.
translation.zh: 你说啥？ 他才不是个多毛的鸡婆胖王八
布兰蒂 你个坏丫头
我会给你带吃的回来的

translation.en: Well, you're here, so it saves me a trip.
translation.zh: 你人在这儿了 省得我多走一趟

translation.en: -I don't wanna walk with it, do I? -Why not?
translation.zh: -我不想带着它走 不是吗？ -为啥？

translation.en: Presumably in your old round, you put things through the door, didn't you?
translation.zh: 但想必在你之前工作的地方 你会把东西投进门里去的吧？

translation.en: Mate, there's no need to get lairy.
translation.zh: 伙计 没必要一副找碴儿的样子

translation.en: -Why are you talking to me like this? -You gonna report me?
translation.zh: 你干嘛这样跟我说话？ -干嘛 要投诉我呀？ -没错
-干嘛 要投诉我呀？ -没错 你叫啥？

translation.en: And if I was, you'd be safe, you tubby little ginger cunt.
translation.zh: 就算我是 也看不上你这个 矮胖的红毛小傻逼

translation.en: I remember my first day, and it is exciting, isn't it?
translation.zh: 我还记得我的第一天 很令人兴奋吧？
-是啊 -这里是个很棒的工作场所

translation.en: Very dynamic, lots of people in and out all the time.
translation.zh: 非常有活力 一直都有很多人进进出出

translation.en: It's very rewarding as well. You get to go out into the community.
translation.zh: 而且会让你受益匪浅 你有机会走出去 接触社区

translation.en: And that can be anything from local stories, you know,
translation.zh: 报导的可以是本地故事、

translation.en: Be nice to her, and she might take you to the opening of a new restaurant,
translation.zh: 对她好一点 她或许会 带你去参加新餐厅的开业 让你免费吃一顿
带你去参加新餐厅的开业 让你免费吃一顿

translation.en: so if you're interested in that...
Everyone chips in on everything, really.
translation.zh: 在这里大家都为所有事情出一份力

translation.en: So what kind of thing are you interested in, would you say?
translation.zh: 那你会说你自己对什么最感兴趣？
这里肯定有你发挥的空间

translation.en: Lots of features. Sky's the limit.
translation.zh: 大把特稿 天空海阔任你写
他是一位非常优秀的作家

translation.en: Very smart, very experienced, good guy. Um...
translation.zh: 非常聪明 非常有经验 是个好家伙

translation.en: He's not himself at the minute, to be honest.
translation.zh: 他最近有点失常 老实说

translation.en: He's had a bit of bad news. Um...
Um, he was married to my sister, Lisa,
I should warn you, he might...
translation.zh: 我得先跟你说 他可能

translation.en: say a few things that are a bit...
at times, so, you know, don't take it personally.
translation.zh: 那你就… 别太往心里去

translation.en: I mean, you will be working closely with him.
translation.zh: 因为你将会和他密切合作嘛

translation.en: I've honestly nothing to compare it to anymore.
translation.zh: 我真的是没东西可以拿来比较了

translation.en: But I guess a good day is when I don't go around
translation.zh: 但我想 当我没那个冲动 想到处开枪轰烂陌生人的脸

translation.en: wanting to shoot random strangers in the face
translation.zh: 之后再把枪口对准自己

translation.en: and then turn the gun on myself.
-Why are you telling me that? -I didn't say his name.
translation.zh: 你告诉我那干嘛？ 我可没提他名字

translation.en: No, I know, but... how does that help me?
translation.zh: 我知道 但是告诉我这个对我有什么帮助？

translation.en: I guess to let you know you're not the only one.
translation.zh: 也许是想让你知道 你不是唯一一个

translation.en: Well, the only mental case out there.
the only guy with mental problems.
translation.zh: 唯一一个有精神问题的人

translation.en: [scoffs] God, man, where do I start?
translation.zh: 天啊 从哪里开始说好？

translation.en: Maybe start with me, as I'm paying, but...
translation.zh: 既然我付你钱 要不从我开始吧 不过…

translation.en: Terrible, isn't it? Scarred for life.
translation.zh: 糟透了 对吧？ 终生创伤

translation.en: If she lives to 100, she's only been scarred for seven percent of her life.
translation.zh: 如果她活到100岁 不过也才创伤了终生的百分之七

translation.en: You're joking, aren't you? I wasn't, but go on. What have you got?
translation.zh: -你在开玩笑吧？ -不是 但请继续 你想说什么？

translation.en: No, I mean, why would you think I was joking about you being boring?
translation.zh: 不 我是指你为啥会觉得我说你无聊 是在跟你开玩笑？

translation.en: Have you got a... counterargument or...
translation.zh: 你是有啥反驳的论点还是…

translation.en: -Why do you let him get away with this? -I don't. [stuttering]
translation.zh: -你为啥就让他这样为所欲为？ -我没有

translation.en: Tony, come on. What's going on?
translation.zh: 托尼 别这样 怎么了？

translation.en: Er, we're putting out a free local newspaper
translation.zh: 我们做的是一份 无人问津的免费的当地报纸

translation.en: -that no one cares about. -No, that's... That's not true.
translation.zh: 我们做的是一份 无人问津的免费的当地报纸 不 那不是真的

translation.en: And that's not what... Can you come in my office?
translation.zh: 而且那不是我… 进我办公室好吗？

translation.en: A lot of people rely on our paper. Not everyone's on Twitter, are they?
translation.zh: 很多人都依赖我们报纸 也不是每个人都玩推特 是吧？

translation.en: What do you want me to say?
That I'm sorry, and I'll buck my ideas up? 'Cause I won't. 'Cause there's no point.
translation.zh: 说我很抱歉 说我会积极点儿？ 因为我不会的 因为根本没意义

translation.en: Look, Tony, I know that you've had issues,
translation.zh: 听我说 托尼 我知道自从失去了丽萨

translation.en: -okay, since you lost Lisa. -Do you reckon...
translation.zh: -你有了一些问题 -你这么觉得？

translation.en: my wife dying affected me a bit?
translation.zh: 我老婆的死对我有一点影响？

translation.en: Of course, and, you know, I get that. I even told Sandy about it.
translation.zh: 当然 而且我明白的 我甚至告诉了珊迪

translation.en: The new girl. I didn't want her thinking this place was a madhouse.
translation.zh: 新来的女孩 我不想要她觉得这是间疯人院

translation.en: Look, I just need a bit of professionalism around here, okay, Tony.
translation.zh: 听着 我需要的只是些许专业态度 好吗 托尼？

translation.en: I shouldn't have to explain this to you.
translation.zh: 我不该非得和你解释这一点

translation.en: You can't just go around being rude to people.
translation.zh: 你不能就这样傲慢无理地对待人家

translation.en: You can, though. That's the beauty of it.
translation.zh: 你可以 这就是它的妙处

translation.en: There's no advantage to being nice and thoughtful
translation.zh: 为人善良、体贴、有爱心、正直
硬要说的话 这些其实是缺点

translation.en: Let's see. If you carry on like this, I might have to let you go.
translation.zh: 你若这样持续下去 我或许得解雇你

translation.en: You won't, that's what I'm saying, 'cause you're a nice bloke.
translation.zh: 那正是我想说的 因为你是个好人

translation.en: So I'll take advantage of you, like everyone else does here.
translation.zh: 所以我会占你便宜 就像这里的每个人一样
你会警告我 我当作没听见

translation.en: You'll give me another warning. I'll ignore it.
translation.zh: 你再警告我 我当作没听见

translation.en: I'll carry on doing what the fuck I want.
translation.zh: 我继续他妈的想干啥就干啥

translation.en: Eventually, you'll give up, and I'll win.
translation.zh: 最终你会放弃 那我就赢了

translation.en: The girls here have discovered that you won't even question "women's problems."
translation.zh: 这里的女孩们已经发现 你从来不会质疑女性问题

translation.en: Kath's had three periods this month.
translation.zh: 凯思这个月来了三次大姨妈

translation.en: She likes Fridays off. You do nothing.
translation.zh: 她喜欢星期五拿假 你啥都不说

translation.en: She gets away with it 'cause she's an arsehole.
translation.zh: 她混得过去 因为她是个混蛋

translation.en: So, I thought, right, let's have a bit of that.
translation.zh: 所以我想 好吧 那我向她学习一下吧

translation.en: Why would you wanna do that?
Why wouldn't you just rather get better and be happy?
translation.zh: 你为什么不选择好起来 然后开开心心的？

translation.en: There's only one thing that'd make me better and happy,
translation.zh: 只有一样东西能让我好起来 让我开心

translation.en: and that's Lisa being around, and that can't happen.
translation.zh: 那就是丽萨回到我身边 而那是不可能的

translation.en: So that's why I nearly killed myself straight away.
translation.zh: 这也就是为什么 我差点就立刻自杀了

translation.en: Right, okay, but you didn't kill yourself, did you?
translation.zh: 对 没错 但最后你没自杀 对吧？

translation.en: So, clearly, you know, something made you stop.
translation.zh: 所以很显然的 某些事情阻止了你

translation.en: The look on the dog's face.
She was hungry, so I thought I'd better feed her.
translation.zh: 它肚子饿了 所以我想我应该喂喂它

translation.en: It gave me time to think, "I should be dead now."
translation.zh: 那给了我时间思考： “我现在应该已经死了才对”
所以一切都是额外收获

translation.en: and I do and say what the fuck I want
translation.zh: 我他妈想干啥就干啥 想说啥就说啥

translation.en: for as long as I want,
and then when it all gets too much,
translation.zh: 而当一切变得让人承受不住时

translation.en: That's the worst superhero I've ever heard of.
translation.zh: 这可是我有史以来听说过的 最糟糕的超级英雄

translation.en: That's the way it is now.
My job now is to make you happy before you kill yourself?
translation.zh: 我现在的工作是让你开心 直到你自行了断吗？

translation.en: That's like a constant ticking clock for me now, is it?
translation.zh: 那对我就像是个 不停滴答作响的倒数时钟吧？
你喜欢的话可以这么想

translation.en: Anyway, that's the way it is.
[Braden] Okay, well, I'm glad we had this chat.
translation.zh: 好 很高兴和你进行了这次对话
是啊 太有建设性了

translation.en: So this is... This is Sandy.
She's just started today. It's her first day, um, so, Tony,
translation.zh: 今天是她第一天上班 托尼 她将会在你手下工作

translation.en: she's gonna be working under you. If you could...
translation.zh: 托尼 她将会在你手下工作 那就请你给她指点指点 说说具体情况

translation.en: show her the ropes, tell her what's what.
translation.zh: 那就请你给她指点指点 说说具体情况

translation.en: We're a disgusting, narcissistic, selfish parasite,
translation.zh: 我们是一群恶心、自恋、 自私的寄生虫

translation.en: and the world would be a better place without us.
translation.zh: 没了我们 这世界会是个更美好的地方

translation.en: It should be everyone's moral duty to kill themselves.
translation.zh: 把自己给解决掉 应该是每个人的道德义务

translation.en: I could do it now. Quite happily just go upstairs,
translation.zh: 我很乐意现在就去做 只需要上楼

translation.en: and make sure I landed on some cunt from Accounts.
translation.zh: 然后确保 我摔在会计部的某位傻逼身上

translation.en: That the sort of thing... you meant?
Um, Lenny, can you show Sandy the ropes?
translation.zh: 兰尼 你能给珊迪指点指点吗？

translation.en: [Braden] Gotta get the papers out. Thank you.
translation.zh: 我得去把报纸送出去 谢谢你

translation.en: -[Tony] You showing her the ropes? -[Lenny] Big-time.
translation.zh: -你给她指点指点是吧？ -一流的

translation.en: Can I guess the bullet points?
Get in. Eat in front of the computer.
translation.zh: 进来 坐在电脑前吃东西

translation.en: Go to the pub. Eat in front of the quiz machine.
translation.zh: 去酒吧 坐在游戏机前吃东西

translation.en: Go home. Eat in front of the telly.
translation.zh: 回家 坐在电视前吃东西

translation.en: Go to bed. I assume you eat in bed?
translation.zh: 上床睡觉 我想你也在床上吃东西吧？

translation.en: I have emergency snacks nearby, yeah.
translation.zh: 或者有紧急零食放在附近 对

translation.en: Want me to bring you more doughnuts, fat boy?
translation.zh: 要我再给你带点甜甜圈吗 肥仔？

translation.en: Do you mind him talking to you like that?
translation.zh: 你不介意他那样跟你说话吗？

translation.en: You don't take any shit off him, all right?
translation.zh: 别白受他的屁 知道吗？

translation.en: I don't, 'cause I'm not weak like him.
translation.zh: 我从不 因为我不像他一样软弱

translation.en: [Braden] Um, we've had a couple of calls from people
saying that their building didn't get any papers delivered.
translation.zh: 说他们的大楼没有收到报纸

translation.en: [Julian] Ah. Okay, look, that's weird 'cause I definitely delivered them all.
translation.zh: 哦 那就奇怪了 因为我的确全都送出去了

translation.en: You know you've got to ring a buzzer to get into the actual building?
translation.zh: 你知道你得按电铃 然后进到大楼里面 对吧？
你不能就把报纸留在街上

translation.en: A lot of the old people can't get up and down the stairs or go out.
translation.zh: 因为很多老年人没办法上下楼梯 或出去

translation.en: Yeah, I know that, boss. I will be extra careful with these.
translation.zh: 是 老板 我知道 我会对这些格外小心的

translation.en: [clears throat] Um, can I get paid now?
You will do a good job, won't you? You can trust me, yeah.
translation.zh: -你会好好干的 对吧？ -会 相信我

translation.en: Just saw you washing in a puddle from a drain,
translation.zh: 刚看见你在排水沟流下的水坑里梳洗

translation.en: and I wondered if it was a special occasion.
translation.zh: 所以在想是不是什么特别的场合？

translation.en: Gonna buy drugs with that and dump the papers in the skip?
translation.zh: 打算用那买毒品 然后把报纸全扔进垃圾桶？

translation.en: Well, I should probably dump them first, then buy the drugs.
translation.zh: 我该先扔了它们 然后再去买毒品
要不然我会把它们给忘了的 对吧？

translation.en: Let's get you sorted, Ray, eh?
translation.zh: 咋们来给你处理一下吧 雷

translation.en: If it was a dog, you'd put it down.
translation.zh: 如果它是只狗 就给安乐死了

translation.en: I was sort of being nice, that...
translation.zh: 我只是用个较好的方式表达…

translation.en: Well, don't you ever feel sorry for them?
translation.zh: 怎么 你从来都不替他们感到可怜吗？

translation.en: We say there's nothing going on inside to make ourselves feel better,
translation.zh: 我们总说自己内心没什么感觉 让自己好受一点 但那都是骗人的

translation.en: but there's definitely something going on.
translation.zh: 让自己好受一点 但那都是骗人的

translation.en: I'll give you a good seeing to.
And don't get drunk all the time, all right?
'Cause it'll only make you feel worse in the long run.
translation.zh: 因为长期下来那只会让你觉得更糟

translation.en: but I have spoken to loads of 'em over the last few months,
translation.zh: 但在过去的几个月里 我与一堆交谈过

translation.en: and they all reckon it's not ideal to be a fat, lazy, self-pitying lump.
translation.zh: 而他们都认为 成为一团自怜的懒肥肉是不理想的

translation.en: If you put the dishes straight in the dishwasher,
translation.zh: 如果你把脏碗碟马上放进洗碗机里

translation.en: And change the salt every now and then.
translation.zh: 还有时不时换一下洗碗盐

translation.en: The garage is that massive thing on the side of the house.
translation.zh: 车库是房子旁边那个巨大的东西

translation.en: You're always talking about killing yourself.
translation.zh: 因为你老是说要自行了断

translation.en: Also, you should be at work, but you know I'll let that slide.
translation.zh: 而且你现在应该在上班 但这个我不跟你计较

translation.en: Come to the pub. Me and Len are going for lunch.
translation.zh: 来酒吧吧 我和兰尼要去那吃午餐

translation.en: -We used to go to the pub all the time. -No!
Someone will make me angry, and that's the day ruined.
translation.zh: 有人会惹我生气 那我的一天就毁了

translation.en: Yeah, I'll take that chance, Bruce Banner.
translation.zh: 我愿意冒那个险 布鲁斯班纳

translation.en: Come on, please. All journalists go to the pub for lunch.
translation.zh: 走嘛 拜托 记者都去酒吧吃午餐的

translation.en: We are journalists. We work for a newspaper.
translation.zh: 我们是记者 我们在一家报社工作

translation.en: Yeah, and that newspaper is used to line cat litter trays
translation.zh: 是啊 然后那报纸 每周都会被老奶奶们

translation.en: by old ladies, once a week.
And they read it before they do that.
translation.zh: 她们是读了才拿去铺的

translation.en: Fuckin' fat cunt eating like a fuckin' slug.
translation.zh: 死肥猪 吃相像个他妈的鼻涕虫

translation.en: -Doing my fuckin' head in. -[Braden] All right.
Why don't you throw yourself into your work?
translation.zh: 不如投身于自己的工作中吧？
不好意思 那让我无法专心
-该死的 -那些是薯片 薯片是脆的

translation.en: Yeah, but why does he have to do all that "mm mmm"?

translation.zh: 总是有个坏好事的人 对吧？

translation.en: And do you think that might be you on this occasion?
translation.zh: 你会不会觉得这次坏事的人是你？
听着 别理他 好吗

translation.en: As I was saying, why don't you throw yourself into your work?
translation.zh: 正如我说的 投身于自己的工作中吧？
抑郁的人都是这么做的

translation.en: It's hard for me to throw myself into my work, when my work
translation.zh: 我很难投身于我自己的工作中 当我的工作很多时候是

translation.en: is often talking to a plumber on the estate
translation.zh: 到庄园里 采访一位水管工

translation.en: who's grown a potato that looks like Lionel Richie.
translation.zh: 因为他种的一颗土豆 长得像莱昂纳尔里奇

translation.en: It did look like him, though.
Actually, this is a good time.
We've got some exciting leads at the moment.
translation.zh: 我们目前有很多令人兴奋的线索
我们是伍德沃德和伯恩斯坦呀？
-是线索没错 -继续 啥线索

translation.en: A woman called us. When she drags her dustbin,
translation.zh: 那天有位女士打进来 说她的垃圾桶
被拖着走时听起来像楚巴卡

translation.en: Woman on Blagden Road woke up Chinese.
translation.zh: 布拉格登路一女士 一觉醒来变成中国人
我知道 我看得出切入点

translation.en: Man who got sent the same birthday card five times.
translation.zh: 男人重复收到 同样的生日卡五次

translation.en: -[Braden] Yeah. -Right, let's get to the bottom of that
translation.zh: -没错 -好 那我们得刨根问底
嗯 好 那你去吧？

translation.en: [Lenny] I didn't wanna do it in his house.
translation.zh: 我不想在他的屋里放 好吗？

translation.en: Go to the doctor. You've got bowel cancer.
translation.zh: 去看医生吧你 肯定是得了肠癌
-嗨 -别出来 这肥胖的臭傻逼
-拉裤子了 -你们是报社来的吗？

translation.en: Yeah. Leave him there for a while.
translation.zh: 对 让他在外待一会儿

translation.en: [man] When I got the first one, I thought, "That's a nice card."
translation.zh: 当我收到第一张的时候 我想：“这卡还真不错”

translation.en: And then I got the second, and I thought, "Oh, that's funny. Two the same!" [laughs]
translation.zh: 然后我收到了第二张 这时我想： “太逗趣了 两张一样的！”

translation.en: [chuckling] But then when I got the third,
I thought, "Well, what are the chances of that?"
translation.zh: 我想：“这发生的几率有多大啊？”

translation.en: I bet that's never happened before.
translation.zh: 我敢打赌那从未发生过

translation.en: -[man] Are you taking notes? -Yeah, all in there.
translation.zh: -你有在做笔记吗？ -有 全在里面

translation.en: Is this going to be in next week's newspaper?

translation.zh: 嗯 我们会尽快赶完它

translation.en: Oh, my Denise would be tickled by this.
translation.zh: 我的丹妮斯一定会被这给逗坏的

translation.en: Anything that happens, I go to tell her.
translation.zh: 不管发生什么事 我都告诉她

translation.en: Nothing's as good if you don't share it.
translation.zh: 有人与你一起分享的东西 才是最美好的

translation.en: but then life throws you these interesting little things, doesn't it?
translation.zh: 但人生时不时就给你送来这些 有趣的小玩意儿 对吧？

translation.en: You can't feel sorry for yourself.
translation.zh: 不能老是替自己感到可怜

translation.en: Excuse me. Where's the dog food?
translation.zh: 不好意思 请问狗粮在哪？
罐头产品 第二条货架

translation.en: [man] All right, mate. You got any money?
translation.zh: 嘿 兄弟 有钱没钱？

translation.en: -Why? -I'll fuckin' kill you if you don't.
translation.zh: 为啥？ 因为不给我就要了你条狗命

translation.en: Does that usually work, does it?
translation.zh: 这招通常都管用 对吧？

translation.en: the threat of death is worse than giving you money,
translation.zh: 死亡的威胁 比没了钱来得可怕

translation.en: Or they're worried you'll hurt their family or...
translation.zh: 或者他们担心你会伤害他们的家人 或者…

translation.en: So, I'm not gonna go into it, but I don't care about anything anymore.
translation.zh: 多余的就不说了 但我已不在乎任何事

translation.en: I'm not giving you any money.
No, I'm just tired of doing things I don't wanna do,
translation.zh: 不 只是厌倦了做我不想做的事情

translation.en: and we always have a choice.
And if I've read this right,
or hand over my money peacefully...
translation.zh: 要么是乖乖地把我的钱

translation.en: [Lisa] It's no one's fault what's happened.
translation.zh: 事情的发生并不是谁的错

translation.en: You know how grumpy you get when things don't go your way.
translation.zh: 你知道当事情不顺你意时 你脾气可以变得多暴躁

translation.en: But you've got such a good heart.
translation.zh: 但你的心地是如此善良

translation.en: You're born like it. You can't contrive it. You're just decent.
translation.zh: 你天生就是那样 策划不出来的 你就是个好人

translation.en: I knew it, first time I met you.
translation.zh: 我第一眼见到你时就知道了

translation.en: Hit me like a bolt of lightning.
translation.zh: 那像一道闪电般击中我的心

translation.en: And I've loved you ever since.
translation.zh: 从此我对你的爱就至死不渝
今天是星期天 你这王八蛋！

translation.en: [Tony, cackling] You're not a real vicar, I can tell.
translation.zh: 看得出你不是个真正的牧师

translation.en: -[Tony] What? -Why'd you do this to me?
[Tony] It's good for you. It gets your heart going.
translation.zh: 因为对你有好处 加快你的心跳
